info.author: RedTurtle Technology
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Introduction
============

This is a product that allows to create and manage some aldermans and show various informations like references and a biography.

Structure
=========

An alderman is a folderish content. In this object you can create additional folders or topics.

Visualization
=============
The view of this object consists in 2 parts:

* top part: is a viewlet registered for alderman's type and shows some infos like the references and the photo. It also shows a list of tabs with additional infos like biography and delegations (if filled), and folders/topics created inside it.

* body part: shows the infos of the selected tab.

.. image:: http://blog.redturtle.it/pypi-images/rer.giunta/alderman


Dependencies
============

This product has been tested on Plone 3.3.5 and Plone 4.2

Credits
=======

Developed with the support of `Regione Emilia Romagna`__;

Regione Emilia Romagna supports the `PloneGov initiative`__.

__ http://www.regione.emilia-romagna.it/
__ http://www.plonegov.it/

Authors
=======

This product was developed by RedTurtle Technology team.

.. image:: http://www.redturtle.net/redturtle_banner.png
   :alt: RedTurtle Technology Site
   :target: http://www.redturtle.net/


Changelog
=========

1.1.3 (2015-12-03)
------------------

- Removed expression in cssregistry.xml and add specific class in the css [cekk]
- Removed unused view show-assessorecss [cekk]
- Plone 4.3 compatibility in assessore_view (new templates style) [cekk]


1.1.2 (2014-05-08)
------------------

- Add tinymce config file [cekk]


1.1.1 (2012-12-05)
------------------

- initial release on pypi [cekk]


1.1.0 (2012-09-10)
------------------

- z3c.autoinclude support [keul]
- Added support for Site Administrator role [keul]
- Viewlet aligned to Plone 4
- Changed used viewletmanager to from "Contentview"
  to "Aboecontenttitle" [keul]

1.0.2 (2011/05/09)
------------------

- Added rolemap.xml [cekk]

1.0.1 (2011/04/08)
------------------

- Some fixes [cekk]

1.0.0 (2011/04/07)
------------------

- Initial release
